author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Debby van Riel, d.vanriel@erasmusmc.nl.

fn.p: Present address: Eefje J. A. Schrauwen, Avans University of Applied Science, Breda, the Netherlands.

Citation Siegers JY, van de Bildt MWG, Lin Z, Leijten LM, Lavrijssen RAM, Bestebroer T, Spronken MIJ, De Zeeuw CI, Gao Z, Schrauwen EJA, Kuiken T, van Riel D. 2019. Viral factors important for efficient replication of influenza A viruses in cells of the central nervous system. J Virol 93:e02273-18. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.02273-18.
